education.degree: Bachelor of Technology: Computer Science and Engineering

projects.name: News-Hub Connect
projects.description: Engineered a cutting-edge news summarization platform leveraging Python's prowess and a bouquet of APIs. Employed the art of web scraping to pluck articles from the digital sea, then sprinkled them with the magic of natural language processing to distill rich insights into bite-sized nuggets. Crafted a captivating frontend oasis using Streamlit, guarded by the fortress of SQL for user authentication and data storage.

projects.name: Crypto-Wave
projects.description: Crypto-Wave is a platform revolutionizing cryptocurrency and NFT management. Operating on a secure blockchain foundation, Crypto-Wave provides a decentralized environment for transparent and immutable transactions. With smart contracts, cryptographic security, and seamless web framework integration, Crypto-Wave empowers users to securely tokenize assets, execute transactions, and explore the world of digital assets.

projects.name: Maya Voice Assistant
projects.description: An advanced voice assistant system developed in Python, Maya offers a comprehensive solution to streamline daily tasks and enhance communication. Equipped with cutting-edge speech recognition technology, Maya understands user commands and queries with precision, providing seamless interaction and deliver high-quality voice assistant solutions that exceed user expectations.

certifications_achievements.name: Codekaze-Sept '23
certifications_achievements.description: A nationwide coding event that celebrates the exceptional talents of coders. Ranked 4110th overall India, 25th in my college, and 3393rd among 24th year and above graduates.

certifications_achievements.name: Complete Machine Learning & Data Science Program
certifications_achievements.description: Developed a strong foundation in machine learning and data science principles. Completed the course in a span of 6 months including a 15+ small learning projects.

certifications_achievements.name: Tata Data Visualization: Empowering Business with Effective Insights
certifications_achievements.description: Completed a simulation involving creating data visualizations for Tata Consultancy Services.

certifications_achievements.name: Industrial Data Science Program
certifications_achievements.description: Projects Included in Certification: Hierarchical Clustering, Linear Discriminant Analysis.

certifications_achievements.name: Leetcode
certifications_achievements.description: Demonstrated proficiency by successfully solving 300+ problems on Leetcode.
